snippet.title: The Sims 4 Horse Ranch: Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Seize opportunities to customize your own ranch, bond with horses, and so much more as you take life by the reins in The Sims™ 4 Horse Ranch Expansion Pack*, launching July 20 at 10 a.m. PT. Pre-order or buy through August 31 to get the Rockin’ Rancher Digital Content**! (This content will become available when the pack launches.)
 
Carve out the ranch life you want in the Horse Ranch Expansion Pack. You’ll be able to choose from different ranch styles – like traditional cabin and big red barn – and you'll have lots of options for what you can do on your land. Host dances and cookouts, invite neighbors to see how cute your mini goats and mini sheep are, make and sell your own nectar, and even hire a ranch hand to help out.
 
One of the most special experiences waiting for you in this pack is living life with majestic horses. Horses are part of your Sims’ families and can be customized in Create a Sim or born as adorable foals on your ranch. You can also add new horses to your family by rescuing or purchasing them. Once horses are in your family they’ll be able to build their own skills in Agility and Jumping. When paired with the right rider a skilled horse can earn awards at the Equestrian Center, so make sure your Sims are honing their riding skills too!
 
Available July 20 at 10 a.m. PT on Origin PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5 
 
Pre-order today and help your Sims relax after all their hard work: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/store/addons/the-sims-4-horse-ranch-expansion-pack
 
*Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack. 
 
**Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/store/addons/the-sims-4-horse-ranch-expansion-pack for details.
